casebody.data:
(November 29, 1950.)

(Republished.)

Modesta Warlock, as Administratrix of the Estate of Cecil Warlock, Deceased, Respondent, v. Victoria Dress Co. Inc., Appellant.

Judgment unanimously reversed and a new trial ordered, with costs to the appellant to abide the event, unless plaintiff stipulates to reduce the judgment to $6,178.75, in which event the judgment, as so modified, is affirmed, without costs. No opinion. Settle order on notice. Present — Glennon, J, P,, Dore, Cohn, Callahan and Shientag, JJ. [See ante, p. 1025.]
